page.title: 12HIGHDOWN HILL
page.content: Highdown Hill is situated north west of Worthing, approximately 2-5 minutes car ride from Goring. It covers a large expanse of land and is covered by lots of people regularly. In a survey carried out by Durrington High School pupils this information was found: Most people were there for a dinner break, for fresh air, for walking the dog. Only 20% infact lived out of the local area i.e. more than 10 miles from Goring. Over 90% travelled by car. 30% of the people asked visited more than once a week; 25% visited more than once a month. The rest came a few times a year. Most people stayed for 1 or 2 hours.
